mapper.select: select c.level_car, count(c.level_car) as seatCount from t_all_ticket at left join t_carriage c on at.carriage_id=c.id where at.train_id = #{trainId} and at.state=1 group by c.level_car

select at.id, tc.carriage_order, s.seat_number, at.seat_id, c.id as carriageId from t_all_ticket at left join t_carriage c on at.carriage_id=c.id left join t_seat s on at.seat_id=s.id left join t_train_carriage tc on tc.carriage_id=at.carriage_id where at.train_id=#{id} and c.level_car=#{levelCar} and at.id not in (select ticket_id from t_sold_ticket where ticket_value&#{curValue} and end_date=#{startDate}) limit 1
